title: How To Become Motivated In A Coronavirus Pandemic : The Magic Of Uncertainty
description: How To Become Motivated in a Coronavirus Pandemic The Magic of Uncertainty Bestselling author, self investment speaker, and certified life and motivation coach Darryl Bumpass Sr cuts through the uncertainty of living during a global Coronavirus Pandemic. In, How To Become Motivated in a Coronavirus Pandemic, Darryl provides readers with the tools they need to be reminded that we didnâ€™t come this far to fall into a space of depression. With each chapter of this book, you will discover tips for how to keep moving forward-- regardless of what stressful events are happening in our lives. We become reminded of how to stay focused on our purpose and how to get out of our own way. With over 30 years of entreprenesureship, Darryl will help you find a way to get rid of the weight of the world on our shoulders and become motivated to push forward in our journey of life.
author: Darryl Bumpass Sr
